name: KU Grades
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.4/jquery.min.js; style-src 'unsafe-inline' https://kusis.ku.edu.tr; img-src 'self' https://kusis.ku.edu.tr; font-src https://kusis.ku.edu.tr; connect-src https://kusis.ku.edu.tr; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content; require-sri-for script
